title: Fireside with the Underboss - "If We Don't Take Card of Him right Away, He'll Bleed To Death"
description: During one of his notorious adventures with his Goombata, Sammy and Ally Boy unexpectedly find themselves in the middle of flying bullets. Before they know it, they're in a car chase with a mysterious shooter and no way out.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: During one of his notorious adventures with his Goombata, Sammy and Ally Boy unexpectedly find themselves in the middle of flying bullets. Before they know it, they're in a car chase with a mysterious shooter and no way out.
